intro: Psychotria cristalensis, commonly known as the Crystalensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the Andean regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers and dark green, glossy leaves. It thrives in humid, shaded environments at high altitudes. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
